job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout The TeamltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtDo you love pursuing complex technical concepts and crafting automated solutions RoleltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWere looking for a JavaScript developer to join our development team to assist in implementing debugging and supporting new creative features Our goal is to bolster the creating elegant functional code and that is fluent in the BIGIP control plane its UX concepts and current design patternsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll Be
